page.title: 07PUPILS' HOBBIES BALQUHIDDER
page.content: Balquhidder school children have a variety of hobbies. Most of the children have got a pony and{horse {riding}is very popular. There are lots of tracks and woodlands to ride in and most families have got enough land to keep a horse in. Another popular hobby, particularly for the boys, is{fishing.}There are plenty of fish in Loch Voil and Loch Doine and all the little streams nearby. Another hobby is{motor bike {scrambling}and there are lots of exciting places for crosscountry riding. There is a{disco}every fortnight in Strathyre hall and a lot of children go to it. It is usually on at the weekends. The children in Balquhidder school go{cycling}to get around. Nearly all the children have got a bicycle and cycling is also a popular pastime here.
